pageContent: Objective: The aim of this study was to assess postprostatectomy erectile function compared to preoperative status by subjective patient perception and the abbreviated International Index of Erectile Function (IIEF-5) questionnaire.

metaData.source:
Orgasmic dysfunction after open radical prostatectomy: clinical correlates and prognostic factors
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/19912504/
